name: Two Points
description:
Two Points is a reverse tower defense game with path building elements where you guide a convoy of flying vehicles into the enemy's territory.  Scout the enemy tower's attack range, plan the route to take, build the path you've chosen, and execute your plan by sending your vehicles in.

How you finish the levels is up to you. You might choose to go bomb broken walls to make new possible routes, you might choose to build concrete paths to boost your vehicles or you might just want to go in with the vanilla way. You have the freedom to choose your style of play.

How to play?

  • Scout the Enemy's Tower
    See the enemy tower's attack range by hovering your cursor above them. Note that some towers have bigger attack range than others.
  • Plan the Route
    Every level is unique. Some levels will be easier by using a certain path and some will be more open. In the end, you plan the route.
  • Build the Pathway
    Your vehicles will not move unless you've finished building your path from the your vehicles spawn point to the enemy's blue block. When other paths have been unlocked, you can choose any combination of path types.
  • Send your Vehicles In
    You need your vehicles in order to infiltrate the enemy's territory. You can send a squadron of jets,  blimps, helicopters or any combinations of them.

Controls

  • Build Paths
    Choose any available path type on the bottom right of the screen by pressing on them. You can place paths on the map by mouse left clicking on the eligible locations and remove them by mouse right clicking those said paths.
  • Send Vehicles
    Press on any of the available vehicle buttons on the bottom left of the screen and they will spawn.
